=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 8, col = 2)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 8, col = 2)

Based on the current state of the game, the avatar is positioned at (row = 8, col = 2) and there are several items and mechanics nearby. The avatar has a lever on the left (positioned at (row = 8, col = 1)) and a belt suitcase immediately to the right of the avatar (positioned at (row = 8, col = 3)). There are also several other belts and potential passengers further down toward the bottom of the map.

Since the last position of the avatar has not changed, which indicates the last action did not lead to any movement, I need to take a new action. The immediate goal would be to manipulate the environment for optimal interaction with the suitcase and the lever.

I could attempt to move the avatar to the left (col = 1) to interact with the lever. This could allow me to change the belt configuration:

``` Action: 1 ```
This action will move the avatar left to the position of the lever, allowing manipulation of the adjacent joint which could assist in moving the suitcase towards passengers or influencing their alignment. This aligns with the strategy of understanding lever mechanics to setup tasks effectively.
